description: Monitoring SQL Servers using Telegraf and Prometheus

targets.query: SELECT mean("total") FROM "State OFFLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "total" FROM "State ONLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "State OFFLINE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "State SUSPECT" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "State RECOVERING" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "State RECOVERY_PENDING" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "State RESTORING" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Point In Time Recovery" FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance metrics' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model BULK_LOGGED" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model FULL" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "total" FROM "Recovery Model SIMPLE" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Database properties' AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Target Server Memory (KB) | Memory Manager" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Total Server Memory (KB) | Memory Manager" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "User Connections | General Statistics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Buffer pool rate (bytes/sec)") FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance metrics' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Memory Grants Pending | Memory Manager" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("Connection memory per connection (bytes)") FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance metrics' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "Free list stalls/sec | Buffer Manager" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("Total target memory ratio") FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "type" = 'Performance metrics' AND "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT "value" FROM "Data File(s) Size (KB) | mssqlsystemresource | Databases" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("value") FROM "Percent Log Used | mssqlsystemresource | Databases" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "Page life expectancy | Buffer Manager" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "Backup/Restore Throughput/sec | _Total | Databases" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Page File Usage (%)") FROM "Performance metrics" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT * FROM "Memory breakdown (%)" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Memory clerk' AND $timeFilter

targets.measurement: Bytes Sent to Replica/sec | _Total | Availability Replica
Bytes Received from Replica/sec | _Total | Availability Replica

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "Transactions/sec | _Total | Databases" WHERE "servername" =~ /$Instance$/ AND "type" = 'Performance counters' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
